title: How to customize a new operator ubder the pre-built caffe2？
body_html:
I install the pre-built caffe2 with this command:
conda install pytorch-nightly cuda80 -c pytorch
The caffe2 and Detectron were installed successfully and I can run the baseline configs. However, I dont konw how to customize a new operator for Detectron as I use the pre-built version of caffe2. I also followed the instructions in FAQ and it only worked when I installed the caffe2 built from source.

body:
I install the pre-built caffe2 with this command:
conda install pytorch-nightly cuda80 -c pytorch
The caffe2 and Detectron were installed successfully and I can run the baseline configs. However, I dont konw how to customize a new operator for Detectron as I use the pre-built version of caffe2. I also followed the instructions in FAQ and it only worked when I installed the caffe2 built from source.
